ver.title: Schema version
ver.description: Version of the schema, according to Semantic versioning (ISO, https://semver.org/ version 2.0.0 or newer)

nam.description: Surname(s), given name(s) - in that order

fn.title: Family name
fn.description: The family or primary name(s) of the person addressed in the certificate

fnt.title: Standardised family name
fnt.description: The family name(s) of the person transliterated

gn.title: Given name
gn.description: The given name(s) of the person addressed in the certificate

gnt.title: Standardised given name
gnt.description: The given name(s) of the person transliterated

dob.title: Date of birth
dob.description: Date of Birth of the person addressed in the DCC. ISO 8601 date format restricted to range 1900-2099

ma.description: Marketing Authorization Holder - if no MAH present, then manufacturer

dt.$comment: SemanticSG: constrain to specific date range?

tg.description: EU eHealthNetwork: Value Sets for Digital Covid Certificates. version 1.0, 2021-04-16, section 2.1

fr.description: ISO 8601 Date of First Positive NAA Test Result
